DOC.brief_summary: This study examine SPD489 subject age 18-65 major depressive disorder ( MDD ) take certain type antidepressant continue residual depression symptom . Eligible patient remain antidepressant randomize either receive supplemental SPD489 placebo ( i.e . sugar pill ) . The purpose study help answer following question : - How safe SPD489 supplemental treatment depression side effect might relate ? - Can supplemental SPD489 help patient still residual depression symptom take antidepressant ? - How much SPD489 give patient depression also take antidepressant ? - How SPD489 compare placebo depressed patient also take antidepressant ?
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Study SPD489 Combination With Antidepressant Treatment Adults With Major Depressive Disorder
DOC.criteria: Subject able provide write , personally sign , date informed consent participate study . Subject 18 65 year age . Subject primary diagnosis nonpsychotic MDD ( single recurrent ) . Subject MADRS total score 24 . Subject female , must negative serum beta human chorionic gonadotropin ( HCG ) pregnancy test negative urine pregnancy test agree comply applicable contraceptive requirement protocol . Subject able swallow capsule . Subject whose current episode MDD respond adequate treatment regimen 2 approve single antidepressant agent . Subject lifetime history treatment resistant depression . Subject current comorbid psychiatric disorder . Excluded : significant Axis II disorder ( include borderline personality disorder ) , bipolar disorder , current lifetime psychosis , post traumatic stress disorder , obsessive compulsive disorder , pervasive development disorder , anorexia nervosa bulimia nervosa . Subject hospitalize ( within last 12 month ) current MDD episode . Subject current lifetime history attentiondeficit/hyperactivity disorder ( ADHD ) . Subject first degree relative diagnose bipolar I disorder . Subject recent history ( within last 6 month ) suspect substance abuse dependence disorder Subject consider suicide risk opinion Investigator , previously make suicide attempt within past 3 year , currently demonstrate active suicidal ideation . Subject concurrent chronic acute illness unstable medical condition . Subject history seizure ( infantile febrile seizure ) , tic disorder , current diagnosis and/or know family history Tourette 's Disorder , serious neurological disease , history significant head trauma , dementia , cerebrovascular disease , Parkinson 's disease , intracranial lesion . Subject known history symptomatic cardiovascular disease , advanced arteriosclerosis , structural cardiac abnormality , cardiomyopathy , serious heart rhythm abnormality , coronary artery disease , serious cardiac problem . Subject history thyroid disorder stabilize thyroid medication treatment within 3 month prior Screening Visit . Subject know family history sudden cardiac death ventricular arrhythmia . Subject glaucoma . Subject history moderate severe hypertension . Current use medication ( include overthecounter [ OTC ] , herbal homeopathic preparation ) central nervous system effect . Subject electroconvulsive therapy ( ECT ) current depressive episode 3 month prior . The subject know suspected intolerance , hypersensitivity , contraindication assign antidepressant treatment ( escitalopram oxalate , sertraline HCl , venlafaxine HCl extend release , duloxetine HCl ) . Subject positive urine drug result . Subject body mass index ( BMI ) < 18.5 > 40 . Subject female pregnant nursing .
